course_name: Advanced Topics in Moral & Political Philosophy
description: This course explores major themes in Anglo-American moral and political philosophy. The course aims to consolidate and integrate previous learning through addressing current issues. Topics will be drawn from concepts in social and political philosophy, environmental philosophy, philosophy of education, legal philosophy and social and economic justice. This course may not run if there are fewer than 20 enrolments.
prerequisites: For Bachelor of Politics, Philosophy and Economics (PPE) students only:PHIL1002, PHIL1013, PHIL1110, PHIL2330
